Verses: 1 adharku Yobu Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
2 aam, Kaariyam Ippadiyirukkiradhu Endru Ariven; Dhevanukku Munbaaga Manushan Needhimaanaayiruppadheppadi?
3 avar Avanode Vazhakkaada Siththamaayirundhaal, Aayiraththil Ondrukkaagilum Avarukku Uththaravu Sollamaattaane.
4 avar Irudhayaththil Gnaanamullavar, Belaththil Paraakkiramamullavar; Avarukku Virodhamaagath Thannaik Kadinappaduththi Vaazhndhavan Yaar?
5 avar Parvadhangalai Sadidhiyaaip Perkkiraar; Thammudaiya Kobaththil Avaigalaip Purattippodugiraar.
6 boomiyin Thoongal Adhiraththakkadhaai Adhai Adhin Sthaanaththinindru Asaiyappannugiraar.
7 avar Sooriyanukkuk Kattalaiyida Adhu Udhikkaadhirukkum; Avar Natchaththirangalai Maraiththuppodugiraar.
8 avar Oruvare Vaanangalai Viriththu, Samuththira Alaigalinmel Nadakkiravar.
9 avar Dhuruvachchakkara Natchaththirangalaiyum, Mirugaseerishaththaiyum, Arumeenaiyum, Thatchana Mandalangalaiyum Undaakkinavar.
10 aaraaindhu Mudiyaadha Periya Kaariyangalaiyum, Ennimudiyaadha Adhisayangalaiyum Avar Seygiraar.
11 idho, Avar En Arugil Pogiraar, Naan Avaraik Kaanen; Avar Kadandhupogiraar, Naan Avarai Ariyen.
12 idho, Avar Pariththukkondupogiraar, Avarai Marippavan Yaar? Neer Enna Seygireer Endru Avaraik Ketpavan Yaar?
13 dhevan Thammudaiya Kobaththaith Thiruppamaattaar; Oruvarukkoruvar Thunai Nirkira Agangaarigal Avarukku Adangavendum.
14 ippadiyirukka, Avarukku Marumozhi Kodukkavum, Avarode Vazhakkaadum Vaarththaigalaith Therindhukollavum Naan Emmaaththiram?
15 naan Needhimaanaayirundhaalum Avarode Vazhakkaadaamal, En Nyaayaadhipadhiyinidaththil Irakkaththukkuk Kenjuven.
16 naan Kenja, Avar Enakku Uththaravu Arulinaalum, Avar En Vinnappaththukku Sevikoduththaar Endru Namben.
17 avar Pusalinaal Ennai Murikkiraar; Mugaandharamillaamal Anegam Kaayangalai Enakku Undaakkugiraar.
18 naan Moochchuvida Enakku Idankodaamal, Kasappinaal Ennai Nirappugiraar.
19 belaththaip Paarththaal, Avare Belaththavar; Nyaayaththaip Paarththaal, En Patchaththil Saatchi Sollugiravan Yaar?
20 naan Ennai Needhimaanaakkinaalum En Vaaye Ennaik Kutravaaliyaakkum; Naan Uththaman Endru Sonnaalum, Naan Maarubaadaanavan Endru Adhu Saatchikodukkum.
21 naan Uththamanendraalum En Ullaththai Naan Ariyen; En Jeevanai Arosippen.
22 oru Kaariyam Undu, Adhai Sollugiren; Sanmaarkkanaiyum Dhunmaarkkanaiyum Avar Azhikkiraar.
23 savukkaanadhu Asuppile Vaadhiththuk Kollumpodhu, Avar Kutramillaadhavargalin Sodhanaiyaippaarththu Nagaikkiraar.
24 ulagam Dhunmaarkkar Kaiyil Vidappattirukkiradhu; Adhilirukkira Nyaayaadhipadhigalin Mugaththai Moodippodugiraar; Avar Idhai Seygiradhillaiyendraal, Pinnai Yaar Idhai Seygiraar.
25 en Naatkal Anjarkaarar Ottaththilum Theeviramaayirukkiradhu; Avaigal Nanmaiyaik Kaanaamal Parandhupom.
26 avaigal Vegamaai Odugira Kappalgalaippolavum, Raiyinmel Paaigira Kazhugaippolavum Kadandhupogiradhu.
27 en Angalaaippai Naan Marandhu, En Mugaththin Dhukkaththai Maatri, Thidankolven Endru Sonnaal,
28 en Varuththangalaippatri Bayamaayirukkiren; Ennaik Kutramillaadhavanaaga Ennamaatteer Endru Ariven.
29 naan Pollaadhavanaayirundhaal, Virudhaavaaip Poraadavendiyadhu Enna?
30 naan Uraindha Mazhaith Thanneeril Muzhugi, En Kaigalai Savukkaaraththinaal Suththampanninaalum,
31 neer Ennai Setruppallaththile Amizhththuveer. Appozhudhu En Vasthirame Ennai Aruvarukkum.
32 naan Avarukkup Pradhiyuththaram Sollugiradharkum, Naangal Koodi Nyaayaththirku Varugiradharkum, Avar Ennaippola Manushan Allave.
33 engal Iruvarmelum Than Kaiyai Vaikkaththakka Maththiyasthan Engalukkul Illaiye.
34 avar Thamadhu Milaatrai Ennaivittu Agatruvaaraaga; Avarudaiya Bayangaram Ennaik Kalangappannaadhiruppadhaaga.
35 appozhudhu Naan Avarukku Bayappadaamal Pesuven; Ippozhudho Appadi Seyya Idamillai.
